ch0082_09_kowai/2701_0701_01_10:
Hey! Did you know there’s a special service
available for people who join Team Break
right now?
ch0082_09_kowai/2701_0701_02_10:
In the morning, Ms. Trista will greet you with a
“Good morning.”
ch0082_09_kowai/2701_0701_03_10: In the afternoon, Ms. Tricia will say hello to you.
ch0082_09_kowai/2701_0701_04_10:
And, at night, Ms. Trinnia will praise you for all
your hard work that day!
ch0082_09_kowai/2701_0701_05_10:
Oooh! This is pure bliss! I’m so glad we took over
the Pokémon Center!
